enabled.description: Enable or disable the static image plugin

image_path.description: Path to the image file to display (relative or absolute)

fit_to_display.description: Automatically fit the image to display dimensions

preserve_aspect_ratio.description: Preserve the image aspect ratio when scaling

background_color.description: RGB background color for transparent areas [R, G, B]

display_duration.description: How long to display the image in seconds
